scripts.build: bun -e 'import solidPlugin from "@opentui/solid/bun-plugin"; const platform = process.platform === "win32" ? "windows" : process.platform; const target = `bun-${platform}-${process.arch}`; const result = await Bun.build({ entrypoints: ["./index.tsx"], target: "bun", outdir: ".", plugins: [solidPlugin], compile: { target, outfile: "pryx-tui" } }); if (!result.success) process.exit(1);'
scripts.build:ci: bun -e 'import solidPlugin from "@opentui/solid/bun-plugin"; const result = await Bun.build({ entrypoints: ["./index.tsx"], target: "bun", outdir: "dist", plugins: [solidPlugin] }); if (!result.success) process.exit(1);'
